CommentBody:
This report may meet the customers needs:
Active Directory > 2. Users > AD_PasswordStatus

https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Solutions/ActiveDirectory/Users/AD_PasswordStatus.htm

This should include everything except who made the change. If they are licensed for AD Activity, we should be able to create a custom report that would join the AD_PasswordStatus_Details table and AD_UserModifications_Details table.

The attached screenshot displays the deprecated job called the:  "Who Made the Change job":
"nea_ad_report_2024_1009_Who_Made_the_Change_job.png"

+++++
Can use or should use the Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Administration > Data Collectors > SMARTLog Data Collector
+++++
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/DataCollector/SMARTLog/Overview.htm

+++++
2024_1010: Terence copied the existing "Account Changes Report" and modified it to get the information that I needed: Who locked and unlocked accounts and performed password changed.

See the attached screenshot = "User_Account_Lock_and_Password_Change_Report_image_2024_1010.png"

+++++
Yes, I was able to copy the "account changes report" and modified it got the information I needed. Who locked and unlocked, password changed.

I found out that when I building the report is was not data shows, it only shows when I run the report send by email as pdf. It make it harder to create an report without the data.
+++++
